name: Cancel Discharge/End Visit
description: Cancellation notification when a previously sent A03 (discharge/end visit) event needs to be reversed
businessPurpose: Cancel a previous discharge notification due to erroneous entry or decision to retain the patient
timing: Sent immediately after determining that a previous A03 discharge event should be cancelled
realWorldScenarios: Patient readmitted within hours due to complications
Discharge entered in error - patient still receiving care
Family unable to provide adequate home care
Patient condition deteriorates after discharge order
Clinical decision to extend stay for observation

generationRules.PV1.3: Patient location after cancellation (may differ from pre-discharge)
generationRules.originalTrigger: References original A03 that is being cancelled
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - discharge cancellation affects bed management, billing, and clinical care
